playn.core.TextFormat.Alignment

    Package Description
    playn.core  

    • Uses of TextFormat.Alignment in playn.core

      Fields in playn.core declared as TextFormat.Alignment 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      TextFormat.Alignment TextFormat.align
      The alignment to use for multiline text.
      Methods in playn.core that return TextFormat.Alignment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TextFormat.Alignment TextFormat.Alignment.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static TextFormat.Alignment[] TextFormat.Alignment.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in playn.core with parameters of type TextFormat.Alignment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextFormat TextFormat.withAlignment(TextFormat.Alignment align)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Graphics.layoutText(String,TextFormat,TextWrap) and render the wrapped lines individually (aligning them as desired).
      TextFormat TextFormat.withWrapping(float wrapWidth, TextFormat.Alignment align)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Graphics.layoutText(String,TextFormat,TextWrap) and render the wrapped lines individually.
      Constructors in playn.core with parameters of type TextFormat.Alignment 
      Constructor and Description
      TextFormat(Font font, float wrapWidth, TextFormat.Alignment align)
      Deprecated. 
      Use TextFormat.TextFormat() and configuration methods.
      TextFormat(Font font, float wrapWidth, TextFormat.Alignment align, boolean antialias)
      Deprecated. 
      wrapWidth and align are no longer supported.
